§ Gorg Varka

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Gorg V⁠arka** is one of the [[world-18-characters]].

**Gorg Varka** lives in the village of [[seyawt]] on planet [[kemeta]].

The village of [[seduat]], that he lives in, has a long history of revering, exalting, and even worshipping [[upuat]].
But his family also has a historical connection with the deity [[upuat]].

§§ Family

**Gorg V⁠arka** is the father of [[lupa-varka]].

And is the adopted father of [[zoon]] — who he raised from birth, and treats and loves him like his own son.

The **Grand Master** [[jangshah]] is **Gorg V⁠arka** //father-in-law//.

§§ History

For a while, **Gorg** served the **emissary** of the [[angel-shiraz]].
